comments.body: I ran git bisect and found HADOOP-7352 broke this.

The test fails because RawLocalFileSystem.listStatus throws IOException after HADOOP-7302.
I wrote a patch to catch IOE and log error message in LogCLIHelpers#getRemoteNodeFileDir. Before this patch, the method catches FileNotFoundException, AccessControlException, and AccessDeniedException, so I'm thinking it's okay to catch IOE as well.
